snippet: Five states had multiple representatives on the United States roster for last Sunday's All-Star Futures Game in Kansas City. The first four were not surprising: California, Florida, Texas and Georgia. The fifth state was Connecticut.
abstract: Five states had multiple representatives on the United States roster for last Sunday's All-Star Futures Game in Kansas City. The first four were not surprising: California, Florida, Texas and Georgia. The fifth state was Connecticut.

headline.main: Great State of Connecticut Gets All-Star Nod
headline.print_headline: Extra Bases: Great State of Connecticut
